17.3" FHD 16:9 "Matte Type" Super Clear Ultra Bright LED Matte Screen (1920x1080)

OS Drive: 500GB Samsung 840 Evo Solid State Drive (Read 540MB/s - Write 410MB/s) Upgraded by Xotic PC Storage Drive: 1TB 7200RPM (SATA III - 6GB/s) / 12GB DDR3 1600MHz [SKU-81418P] (Dual Channel Memory (1x4GB + 1x8GB SODIMMS)) / 6x Blu-Ray Reader + 8x DVDRW/CDRW Super Multi Combo Drive / Built-in Single Band Wireless 802.11B/G/N - Stock Wireless Card + Bluetooth 4.0
WINDOWS 8.1 - 64-Bit (Pre-Installed) / 2 Year MSI US/Canada Parts & Labor 1 Year Global Warranty w/ Lifetime Tech Support + 1 Year Accidental Damage Warranty (Requires Registration within 30 Days from Ship Date) Upgraded by Xoitic PC Parts 1yr warranty (Domestic)***Computers with parts upgraded by Xotic PC do require us to break the factory seal to perform the upgrades. Once parts have been installed, stressed tested, and the computer has gone through our Quality Assurance we will apply a new seal then ship the computer to you.
